Caption: Figure 7. Results for two scenes computed using only homographies as the motion model; compare these results to those in Figures 4 and 1 that are computed using both homographies and fundamental matrices with per-pixel disparities.
Mention:
Finally, we show two results computed using only ho-
mographies as a motion model, which is similar to the ap-
proach of Wills et al. [19], in Figure 7. Notice that multiple
homographies are required to describe the motion of a sin-
gle 3D object, while our results can describe an object with
a single fundamental matrix and provide information about
depth for 3D reconstruction.
